poem:
Title: In The Hush Between 

In the hush between tweet
and silence, lives the echo 
of a boomer's voice,
entitled, owning rooms untouched,
fumbling to catch the ephemeral rhythm
of hastening digital beats.

An awkward pause,
a question mark in the conversation,
pulses alive in digital verses,
lost ain't in the chatter but
the stillness that envelops,
the pause left uncaptured.
